title: @KateyKhaos
body: Can Ivern please get a pumpkin head skin or skeleton skin for the Harrowing(or snowdown), ya know, so he looks reminiscent of Jack Skellington, pleassssssssssssse. Hes already got the walk and all the groves could be pumpkin vines or maybe even graveyard style if its to be spooky.

replies.body: He does have the creepy walk. I'd be down for something like we did with Fiddlesticks wayyy back in the day. Unfortunately, it's a bit too late this year to consider it, but I've made a note to suggest this for next Halloween! (I have a master list and folder of awesome player concepts!)
How big is this list? Is it 9001?
Well, with this one, 9002. ;) Seriously, though, we have a ton of ideas, and they get brought up when an applicable ideation comes around. ^-^
